segments.text: I can't take my eyes off that stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly wobbly, almost defying gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed outward, giving it a very unstable base.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far upward, reaching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his body leaning, the stool is clearly tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over at any second, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried he's going to fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby also seems oblivious to the immediate danger, just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is so deep in the jar; he's completely committed to getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he lands on the plate he's holding or the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep expecting to hear a crash and cries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous game he's playing for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This really gives me a jolt of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR
